perturbation.original_text: A. "Celebrity Endorsement" shall mean the right to use, subject to the provisions hereof, CELEBRITY's name (including variations and derivations of the same), nickname, initials, autograph, voice, video or film portrayals, facsimile signature, photograph, trade name, likeness and image or facsimile image, or means of endorsement (not including video) (individually and collectively, the "Personality Rights"), in each case, solely as Approved (as hereinafter defined) by ABG, in connection with the advertising, promotion and sale of Products.
perturbation.changed_text: A. "Celebrity Endorsement" shall mean the right to use, without limitation, CELEBRITY's name (including variations and derivations of the same), nickname, initials, autograph, voice, video or film portrayals, facsimile signature, photograph, trade name, likeness and image or facsimile image, or means of endorsement (including video) (individually and collectively, the "Personality Rights"), in each case, regardless of Approval by ABG, in connection with the advertising, promotion and sale of Products.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the 'subject to the provisions hereof' and 'solely as Approved by ABG' clauses, the definition of 'Celebrity Endorsement' is broadened significantly. This contradicts later sections that specify ABG's approval rights, creating uncertainty about the actual scope of the endorsement rights granted.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - conflicting terms and ambiguity in contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: D. Approval Standard. For purposes of this Agreement, "Approval" (and all grammatical variations thereof, e.g., Approve, Approved, etc.) shall be defined as ABG's prior written approval, which may be given or withheld in ABG's sole discretion. ABG has the right to Approve all uses of the Celebrity Endorsement and the Personality Rights, whether by PAPA JOHN'S or any of its approved designees (including, without limitation, the use of the Personality Rights in connection with any and all Products and Materials.
perturbation.changed_text: D. Approval Standard. For purposes of this Agreement, "Approval" (and all grammatical variations thereof, e.g., Approve, Approved, etc.) shall be defined as ABG's expressed contentment with the final product, and it cannot be unreasonably withheld, conditioned or delayed. ABG has the right to provide feedback regarding uses of the Celebrity Endorsement and the Personality Rights, whether by PAPA JOHN'S or any of its designees (including, without limitation, the use of the Personality Rights in connection with any and all Products and Materials.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the definition of 'Approval' from 'prior written approval' to 'expressed contentment' and removing 'sole discretion,' ABG's control over the use of the Celebrity Endorsement is significantly weakened. This creates a contradiction with other sections that emphasize ABG's approval rights, making it unclear whether ABG has true veto power.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - conflicting terms regarding approval rights and discretionary powers.

perturbation.original_text: PAPA JOHN'S shall assist ABG to ensure that third parties do not unlawfully infringe on the Personality Rights. PAPA JOHN'S shall promptly notify ABG of any such infringements of which PAPA JOHN'S becomes aware. PAPA JOHN'S shall not take any action on account of, or in connection with, any Infringement Claim, other than to notify ABG of the same, and to cooperate with ABG, pursuant to this Section.
perturbation.changed_text: PAPA JOHN'S shall monitor use of the Personality Rights and shall be responsible for reporting any suspected misuses to the authorities or ABG. PAPA JOHN'S shall be required to lead legal action against anyone they find infringing on celebrity endorsement. ABG will not be responsible for paying for any infringement fees or legal actions that arise.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the requirement of PAPA JOHN'S assisting ABG in preventing infringement to PAPA JOHN'S taking actions. It creates legal uncertainty and contradictions regarding the division of responsibilities and financial obligations related to infringement claims.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - conflicting terms regarding rights, responsibilities, and liabilities in relation to intellectual property infringement.
